"Finally... We finally did it!":
"Dad... Everyone...
We did it. We really did it."

"We couldn't have won
this without everyone's help."

"You three were by far the most
crucial to make this all happen."

"You left a lasting impression
on the ARKS of every region."

"This spectacle is something that was
established by none other than you three."

"There are still DOLLS
remaining here on Halpha."

"We may have done away with the biggest threat,
but the fighting will likely continue for a while."

"Will you three continue
to fight alongside us?"

"Well, let's just celebrate
our victory for the time being."
